reviewText: I have a collection of crime series and this one was worth the price. It's a great one to add to my collection and will get the rest of series.
Title: True Crime Series Volume 1: Secrets, Sins & Stalkers

reviewText: A very good and enjoyable TRUE CRIME SERIES. It goes deep into the subject of stalking, and tells the true storys of what these poor women are put through. I have experienced stalking, [Its Nasty] And you are always wondering what they may do next, and if you are going to survive it. All the storys they show are very interesting. You are also taken to the places where these events took place. Such as beautiful ASPEN in the winter time, covered in snow. And ALBUQUERQUE showing you around all that area. This series deals with STALKING, OBSESSION, HARASSMENT, KIDNAPPINGS, and MURDER. Its chilling. But i reccommend TRUE CRIME SERIES VOLUME ONE.  The episodes are...SINS AND SECRETS....KNOXVILLE....NOWHERE TO RUN....ALBUQUERQUE....ASPEN....STALKED ....SOMEONES WATCHING....NEIGHBORHOOD WATCH....DANGEROUS GAMES....TEENAGE OBSESSION.
Title: True Crime Series Volume 1: Secrets, Sins & Stalkers

reviewText: Where were we before the discovery of DNA and other modern means to find one one guilty of a crime. And where would we be now without it.
